title: yellowpaper.io not in sync with this repo
body: It still points to an older version of the PDF.
Are there any links pointing to yellowpaper.io? This here should be the reference: http://ethereum.github.io/yellowpaper/paper.pdf
The README here points to it.

Ah, it seems @gavofyork added that link. Gavin, can you please either remove the link to yellowpaper.io, make sure that it is up-to-date or mention that it shows a version that is not necessarily the latest version?

# This issue is a huge serious problem.

---

The link has been removed from the README (https://github.com/ethereum/yellowpaper/commit/98fe5bfe3e3dc12b2515ab4b93c915eb88a64940), however what @fulldecent points out is correct. I would much rather see the link updated instead of broken on all those pages.
@gavofyork the simplest solution would be to redirect it to https://ethereum.github.io/yellowpaper/. Please do that!
